Trump taps financier and donor Phelan to be Navy secretary  —  John Phelan did not serve in the military and does not have a long track record with the Navy.  —  President-elect Donald Trump has selected businessman John Phelan as his nominee to lead the Navy, according to a statement released on Tuesday night.
